gt_lyric: [intro-short] ; [verse] The city lights are glowing soft and blue.Im sitting here just thinking about you.A saxophone is playing down the street.Im moving to the rhythm of the beat.Your smile is like a classic movie scene.The finest thing that I have ever seen ; [prechorus] The stars are leaning in to hear us talk.Were taking such a quiet midnight walk.The world is spinning slow and perfectly.Just you and me in harmony ; [chorus] No need to rush the feeling tonight.Everything is sounding just right.Soft piano and a velvet sky.I see the forever in your eye ; [bridge] No need to rush the feeling tonight.Everything is sounding just right.Soft piano and a velvet sky.I see the forever in your eye ; [outro-short]
descriptions: male, Pop, Jazz, Happy, Calm, the bpm is 105.
